Ormskirk Music Society

Friendly, dedicated musicians in the heart of West Lancashire

The Society is made up of a choir and an orchestra, which perform a truly diverse range of music across five concerts each year.

Both the choir and the orchestra are on the lookout for new members. We don't hold auditions and encourage singers and players to come along to one of our rehearsals to give us a try. For more information please click here for the choir and here for the orchestra.

For details of our upcoming concerts and information about booking tickets, click here.
